styles.name: Scandinavian Minimalism
styles.description: This style emphasizes simplicity and functionality, with a neutral color palette and sleek furniture.

styles.name: Industrial Loft
styles.description: Characterized by exposed brick, metal fixtures, and an open floor plan, this style evokes the look of an urban warehouse.

styles.name: French Country
styles.description: A rustic yet elegant style featuring distressed wooden furniture, soft pastel colors, and vintage accents.

styles.name: Mid-Century Modern
styles.description: Known for its clean lines, organic curves, and a mix of natural and man-made materials, this style is a nod to the 1950s and 60s design.

styles.name: Bohemian Eclectic
styles.description: A vibrant and diverse style that embraces a mix of colors, textures, and patterns, often with a global influence.

styles.name: Japanese Zen
styles.description: Focusing on simplicity, balance, and natural materials, this style creates a serene and harmonious environment.

styles.name: Mediterranean Revival
styles.description: Inspired by coastal regions, this style features terracotta tiles, stucco walls, and dark wood furniture to evoke a warm, relaxed atmosphere.

styles.name: Art Deco Glamour
styles.description: This style highlights luxurious materials, bold geometric patterns, and sparkling metallics reminiscent of the 1920s and 30s.

styles.name: Rustic Farmhouse
styles.description: Combining comfort and practicality, this style uses natural materials, distressed wood, and vintage accessories to create a cozy, countrified appeal.

styles.name: Victorian Elegance
styles.description: Characterized by ornate detailing, rich colors, and intricate patterns, this opulent style reflects the Victorian era's appreciation for luxury.

styles.name: Coastal Chic
styles.description: Inspired by the beach, this style features light, airy spaces with natural textures and a calming color palette of blues and whites.

styles.name: Urban Jungle
styles.description: This style incorporates abundant greenery and natural elements to create a lush, plant-filled oasis within a modern urban setting.

styles.name: Contemporary Elegance
styles.description: Featuring sleek, state-of-the-art design with an emphasis on form and comfort, this style is minimal yet luxurious.

styles.name: Tropical Oasis
styles.description: This style embraces vibrant colors, bamboo and rattan furniture, and exotic decor to create a lively, tropical ambiance.

styles.name: Traditional Indian
styles.description: Characterized by rich colors, intricate patterns, and ornate wooden furniture, this style reflects the cultural heritage of India.
